[source, python]
----
resp = client.watcher.put_watch(
    id="log_error_watch",
    trigger={
        "schedule": {
            "interval": "10s"
        }
    },
    input={
        "search": {
            "request": {
                "indices": [
                    "logs"
                ],
                "body": {
                    "query": {
                        "match": {
                            "message": "error"
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    condition={
        "compare": {
            "ctx.payload.hits.total": {
                "gt": 0
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
----
